Hi Markus,

I am following that project, but i am still getting confused ab=
out starting heritrix using JAVA and creating SSLSocketFactory, as I am new=
 to this. its still bit hazy for me.

Do i need to start heritrix and then =
separately start HTTPS connection session ? if Yes, then which JAVA API sho=
uld i call to start server.

Or when I create HTTPS connection it will auto=
matically start heritrix.

I am sorry if i am asking some stupid question h=
ere, but still its confusing for me to use this rest APIs. so it would be g=
reat if you can give me sample working code (just one method should be fine=
 to give an idea about using APIs) or guide me through this.

Badal
